editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-4r: Prayer of the Covenant, Ṣälotä Kidan, ጸሎተ፡ ኪዳን፡, with musical notation. Chants called Liton, ሊጦን፡ (). Supplication Prayer, Zäyǝnägǝs, ዘይነግሥ (). The Ordinary of the Mass, ሥርዓተ፡ ቅዳሴ፡ (). Anaphora of the Apostles, Qǝddase Ḫawaryat, ቅዳሴ፡ ሐዋርያት፡ (31v). Anaphora of Our Lord, ቅዳሴ፡ እግዚእ፡ (). Anaphora of Our Lady Mary attributed to Cyriacus of Bǝhǝnsa, Qǝddase Maryam Gwäs’a, ቅዳሴ፡ ማርያም፡ (). Anaphora of John, Son of Thunder, Qǝddase Yoḥannǝs Wäldä Nägwädǝgwad, ቅዳሴ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወልደ፡ ነጐድጓድ፡ (). Anaphora of Dioscorus, Qǝddase Diosǝqoros, ቅዳሴ፡ ዲዮስቆሮስ፡ (). Anaphora of Gregory of Armenia, the Wonder Worker, ጎርጎርዮስ፡ ዘአርማንያ፡ (). Anaphora of Epiphanius, Qǝddase Epifanǝyos, ቅዳሴ፡ ኤጲፋንዮስ (68v). Anaphora of John Chrysostom, Qǝddase Yoḥannǝs Afä Wärq, ቅዳሴ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ አፈወርቅ፡ (). Anaphora of Athanasius the Apostolic, Qǝddase Atǝnatewos, ቅዳሴ፡ አትናቴዎስ፡ (). Anaphora of Gregory, brother of Basil, Qǝddase Gorǝgorǝyos, ‘Ǝḫǝwä Baslǝyos., ቅዳሴ፡ ጎርጎርዮስ፡ እኅወ፡ ባስልዮስ፡ (). Anaphora of Jacob of Serugh, Qǝddase Ya’ǝkob Zä-Śǝrug, ቅዳሴ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ዘሥሩግ፡ (). Anaphora of Cyril of Alexandria, Qǝddase Qerǝlos, ቅዳሴ፡ ቄርሎስ፡ (89r).

origin.origDate: F. 13r mentions Emperor Menilek. F. 21v mentions Abba Qerelos, and Abba Matewos.

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
